tool_description: This tool allows you to perform an increment by one on your integer
name: Plus One
title: Plus One

api_list.name: get plus one
api_list.description: Get your integer, incremented by one
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://plus-one.p.rapidapi.com/15"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "plus-one.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://plus-one.p.rapidapi.com/{number}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "plus-one.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
